original: nanu jñānaśamayoḥ saṃpattau puruṣasya kena yatnenottamapadaprāptir bhavatīty / atra sadṛṣṭāntam uttaraṃ kathayati

original: yathā kamalarakṣiṇyā gītyā vitatatārayā / khagotsādena sahito gītānandaḥ prasādhyate //MU_2,20.8//

original: mumukṣuvyavahāraprakaraṇābhidheyaṃ vastūpasaṃharati

original: kiṃ karoṣīty apekṣāyām āha / tathopadiśyata iti / tathā sadācārakramavat / jñānakramaḥ

prakaraṇamāhātmyaṃ kathayati
analyzed: prakaraṇa māhātmyam kathayati

original: idaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ puruṣārthaphalapradam / tajjñād āptātmaśāstrārthāc chrotavyaṃ kila dhīmatā //MU_2,20.11//

original: tvam etac chrutvā / siddhāt buddhinairmalyāt / balāt ayatnam eva / satpadaṃ yāsyasi / atrottarārdhena dṛṣṭāntam āha / yatheti / katakam jalaśuddhikārī  #

analyzed: dravya viśeṣaḥ

original: viditavedyam idaṃ hi mano mune vivaśam eva hi yāti paraṃ padam / yad avabuddham akhaṇḍitam uttamaṃ tad avabodhadaśāṃ na jahāti hi //MU_2,20.13//
analyzed: vidita vedyam idam hi manaḥ mune vivaśam eva hi yāti param padam  yat avabuddham akhaṇḍitam uttamam tat avabodha daśām na jahāti hi

analyzed: he mune muni karma anvita tvāt muni rūpa śrī rāma hi yasmāt vidita vedyam manaḥ vivaśam

original: eva paraṃ padaṃ yāti / ato viditavedyatvakāriṇaḥ etacchāstraśravaṇāt satpadaprāptir
analyzed: eva param padam yāti atas vidita vedya tva kāriṇaḥ etad śāstra śravaṇāt sat pada prāptiḥ

analyzed: yuktā evā iti bhāvaḥ nanu vidita vedyam api manaḥ yadi kadācid vidita vedya tām jahāti

original: tadā kiṃ kāryam / ity atrāha / yad iti / manasā yat uttamaṃ na tv adharaṃ bhogarūpaṃ

original: vastu / avabuddhaṃ samyaṅ niścitam / tat manaḥ / tadavabodhadaśāṃ tasyottamasya vastunaḥ /

original: yo 'vabodhaḥ tasya daśāṃ / hi niścayena / na jahāti / viditavedyo hi kadācid api
analyzed: yaḥ tasya daśām hi niścayena na jahāti vidita vedyaḥ hi kadācid api

analyzed: vidita vedya tām na jahāti iti tātparyam iti śivam śivam śivam iti

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ mumukṣuprakaraṇe viṃśaḥ sargaḥ // 2,20 //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām mumukṣuprakaraṇe viṃśaḥ sargaḥ

analyzed: śrotṝṇām bhāvanā āveśa satkṛta svānta śālinām

original: svātmalābhamahodāraphalayogyatvabhāvanaḥ /
mumukṣuvyavahāro 'yaṃ sphuratān mama mānase // 3 //

analyzed: iti śrī kāśmīra maṇḍala antarvarti ārādhya pāda mahā māheśvara vaiḍūryakaṇṭha ātmaja śrīmat avatārakaṇṭha putra śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām

analyzed: śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām mumukṣu vyavahāra prakaraṇam samāptam iti śivam
